page.title: 02Ilchester School Pupils
page.content: We have{261 children}on our school register. They are in 9 classes of between 22 and 34 pupils. Children from 4 to 7 years old are in 4 classes on the Illustrious Crescent site while the 7 to 11 year olds are in 5 classes on the Somerton Road site. As a result of parental choice, we receive children{from 100 square mile area. Since no public transport is available,children arrive on school buses and by private car. Only the 183 village pupils arrive on foot, as the road is too busy to allow bicycles. This is our{catchment area: } Houndstone(Yeovil)17 Somerton 6 Queen Camel 15 Yeovilton 5 South Barrow 2 Podimore 4 Marston Magna 1 Draycott 3 Over Stratton 1 Ashington 2 Tintinhull 11 Kingsdon 2 Limington 9
